title: KSITIL Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 09 Engineer Posts
description: The Kerala State Information Technology Infrastructure Limited (KSITIL) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 09 Junior Engineers, Assistant Engineers, and Assistant Project Manager Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed theirÂ B.E./B.
